data.text:
In The Counterfeit Traitor

…fellow spy Marianne Möllendorf (Lilli Palmer), with whom he develops an intense romantic relationship. After the Gestapo uncovers the truth about Möllendorf, the couple is arrested. Erickson witnesses her execution but is able to convince his captors of his innocence. His reprieve is brief, however, as a member of…

In George Seaton: Later films
